group_1.narration: What a coincidence, running into you here!
Huh, it's not a coincidence?@You came here to see me?
...Ohh, I see!@You want to know the secret behind the strength@of the mightiest Magical Girl, Tsuruno Yui!
But, I'm sorry...@The truth is, me being the strongest,@it was all a lie...
You'll be seeing everything about me here...@So let me get this out of the way first,@before I disappoint you.
If that's okay... I've been thinking about my past too,@so let's take a peek into it together.
I, the one and only Tsuruno Yui,@will be your commentator! Yep yep!
